ModMetaData.name: MorrowRim - Glass and Ebony
ModMetaData.author: SirMashedPotato
ModMetaData.description:
Adds in both glass and ebony, rare volcanic glass found deep underground, though surface nodes also exist. Both are around plasteel tier, with glass being lighter with slightly lower stats, and ebony being heavier with slightly higher stats.

-Supports Vanilla Achievements Expanded.
-Includes a patch that adds both glass and ebony to Empire (Royalty) traders.
-Includes a patch that adds glass and ebony to the Jewellery crafting materials.
-Includes a patch for MorrowRim - Dunmer Factions Medieval Edition, which makes the ordinator mace and scimitar craftable using ebony, gold and steel.
-Based on the 'Elder Scrolls' series by Bethesda Game Studios.
